bwwExcerpt: Like several shows this season, “Book of Mormon” is too long and comes close to wearing out its welcome before redeeming itself with a strong second act. And like most 12-year-old-boys, it isn’t nearly as nasty as it would have us believe. Not that there’s anything wrong with that.

keyPhrases.quote: comes close to wearing out its welcome before redeeming itself with a strong second act
